attributes.action: stop Ian Brady from being allowed to move to a Scottish jail and given the right to die
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Moors Murderer Ian Brady's Lawyers are launching an appeal to move Brady to a Scottish Jail where he may be allowed the right to die.
In light of the release by a Scottish jail of the Lockerbie bomber,this very well could happen.
Brady showed no mercy to his victims and still refuses to tell Winnie Johnson where the body of her son keith bennett is buried.

rejection.details: We cannot accept petitions of this nature as individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office. Please refer to our terms and conditions for more information: http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/terms
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
